Package org.aeonbits.owner.event

Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by OWNER components.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ReloadListener
    The listener interface for receiving reload events.
    TransactionalPropertyChangeListener
    A Listener that is aware of properties changes, with transactional capability.
    TransactionalReloadListener
    A Listener that is aware of properties reloads, with transactional capability.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Event
    The root event class for all OWNER events.
    ReloadEvent
    A semantic event which indicates that a reload occurred.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RollbackBatchException
    Indicates that whole batch of event must be rolled back.
    RollbackException
    Superclass for event rollback.
    RollbackOperationException
    Indicates that operation must be rolled back.

Package org.aeonbits.owner.event Description

Provides interfaces and classes for dealing with different types of events fired by OWNER components. See the Event class. Events are fired by event sources. An event listener registers with an event source to receive notifications about the events of a particular type. This package defines events and event listeners, as well as event listener adapters, which are convenience classes to make easier the process of writing event listeners.
